attributes.action: Bring back the Death Penalty for the Murder of Children
attributes.additional_details:
After yet another tragedy in the death of a young child in this country it is time to stand up and be heard.

If you think the death penalty should be brought back for these sick animals then please sign this petition and pass it on, if you don't sign it then still pass it on.

I'm pretty sure these young children that fall at the hands of evil would exchange their deaths in return for even 25 years in a prison cell with television & family visits every so often but they can't.

Time to act and stand up.

Please sign
